exercises.name: Squat
exercises.notes: Sit back and down, keep upper back tight

exercises.name: Squat or Machine Squat
exercises.notes: Sit back and down, keep your upper back tight to the bar

exercises.name: Barbell RDL
exercises.notes: Maintain a neutral lower back, set your hips back, don't allow your spine to round

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.notes: Focus on squeezing your quads to make the weight move.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.notes: Press all the way up to your toes, stretch your calves at the bottom, don't bounce

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.notes: Round your back as you crunch

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.notes: Set up a comfortable arch, quick pause on the chest and explode up on each rep

exercises.name: High-Incline Smith Machine Press
exercises.notes: Set the bench at a 45-60 degree incline, touch the bar to your upper chest with control

exercises.name: Egyptian Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Lean away from the cable. Focus on squeezing your delts.

exercises.name: Overhead Cable Triceps Extension
exercises.notes: Do both arms at once, resist the negative

exercises.name: Cable Triceps Kickback
exercises.notes: Lean slightly forward, lock your elbow behind your torso (shoulder hyperextension)

exercises.name: Neutral-Grip Lat Pulldown
exercises.notes: Pull your elbows down against your sides

exercises.name: Pendlay Row
exercises.notes: Initiate the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades together, pull to your lower chest, avoid using momentum

exercises.name: EZ-Bar Curl
exercises.notes: Arc the bar "out" not "up", focus on squeezing your biceps

exercises.name: Hammer Cheat Curl
exercises.notes: You can use slight momentum on the concentric, but control the eccentric with your elbows stationary

exercises.name: Hack Squat
exercises.notes: Allow your knees to come forward (past your toes), focus the tension on your quads

exercises.name: Seated DB Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Bring the dumbbells all the way down, keep your torso upright

exercises.name: Close-Grip Seated Cable Row
exercises.notes: Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together, drive your elbows down and back.

exercises.name: Weighted Dip
exercises.notes: Tuck your elbows at 45°, lean your torso forward 15°, shoulder width or slightly wider grip

exercises.name: Seated Leg Curl
exercises.notes: Focus on squeezing your hamstrings to move the weight

exercises.name: Machine Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Focus on squeezing your lateral delt to move the weight
